# users

**Instance Property**

All users associated with the home.

## Declaration

```swift
var users: [HMUser] { get }
```

## Deprecated symbols

- **addUser(completionHandler:)**: Adds a user to the home.
- **removeUser(_:completionHandler:)**: Removes a user from the home.
